title: Eurobot 2020 score simulator - By We Robot

header.title: Eurobot 2020 score simulation
header.author: Created by the {{- werobot }} team to help you!

inColoredFairway.title: Buoys in the colored fairway line
inColoredFairway.description: 1pt additionally per valid buoy on the fairway line of its color.

validPairs.title: Pairs of buoys
validPairs.description: 2pts per pair of valid buoys on the fairway lines of one port. A valid pair includes one green buoy and one red.

orientation.title: Anchor safely
orientation.none-master: Not in or in differents zones
orientation.none-junior: The robot is not in the right zone
orientation.onlyOne: Only one of the robot is valid
orientation.bad: Robot(s) are in the bad zone
orientation.good-master: Robot(s) are in the right zone
orientation.good-junior: The controlled robot is in the right zone

junior.none: The driven robot is not in a zone
junior.good: The driven robot is in the right zone
junior.bad: The driven robot is not in the right zone

robotInGoodZone.title: Valid robots in the indicated zone
robotInGoodZone.description: If a team has one robot 20pts else 10pts per robot.

robotInBadZone.title: Valid robots in the other zone
robotInBadZone.description: If a team has one robot 6pts else 3pts per robot.
